## RequestManager.eth\_getBlockByNumber property

Returns information about a block by block number.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
eth_getBlockByNumber: (block: BlockIdentifier, fullTransactionObjects: boolean) => Promise<BlockObject>;
```
